longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
 - Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
   5 years) National ID Cards issued 
   
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of French
  Polynesia. 
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of France.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days:
 - for nationals of French Polynesia; 
Minors:
- Minors under 14 years of age  
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of French Polynesia will be
  expected to hold their own passport or National ID Card
  (where applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia,
  Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- The max. stay is granted within 6 months to visa exempt
  nationals. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
